title: "data_science_project"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)

url <- "https://www.indeed.com/jobs?q=data%20scientist&from=googlesl"
webpage <- read_html(url)


company <-webpage%>%html_nodes(".company")%>%html_text()
skill <-webpage%>%html_nodes(".experienceList")%>%html_text()
location <- webpage%>%html_nodes(".location")%>%html_text()
webpage_table<- data.frame(company,skill,location)


company <- lapply(paste0("https://www.indeed.com/jobs?q=data%20scientist&from=googlesl", 1:5),
                function(url){
                    url %>% read_html() %>% 
                        html_nodes(".company") %>% 
                        html_text()
 })


skill <- lapply(paste0("https://www.indeed.com/jobs?q=data%20scientist&from=googlesl", 1:5),
                function(url){
                    url %>% read_html() %>% 
                        html_nodes(".experienceList") %>% 
                        html_text()
 })

location <- lapply(paste0("https://www.indeed.com/jobs?q=data%20scientist&from=googlesl", 1:5),
                function(url){
                    url %>% read_html() %>% 
                        html_nodes(".location") %>% 
                        html_text()
 })

webpage_table<- data.frame(company,location)


```
